item.title: Making an NPC talk
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

ok ill help go into your npchandler.java and search for moo under the second } put this

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("yourname")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner yourname is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner your name is OFFLINE"; } }

to make the monster say if your online or offline

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Whatever you want"; } }

thats just too make a monster talk

Read full topic
